info.title: SkyWise Insight API (Beta)
info.description: The SkyWise Insight API is an interface to WDT’s Weather as a Service® analytics platform,  allowing application developers to leverage high quality weather information  for applications, and products. The SkyWise Insight API provides access to  historical, current, and forecast data for any region of interest,  such as an agriculture field, urban area, or utility service area.  API response formats can include time-series, summaries, or contours.

basicAuth.description:
HTTP Basic Authentication. Works over and `HTTPS`

Please contact WDT for a `username` and `password` (also referred to as an `application ID` and `key`).

Up to five passwords may be in use at any time. This allows old passwords to be disabled without any downtime.

get.description: Asset List
Asset Information

parameters.name: asset-uuid
parameters.description: Unique asset id.

parameters.name: asset-uuid
parameters.description: Unique asset id.

parameters.name: asset-uuid
parameters.description: Unique asset id.

get.description:
Provides the accumulated growing degree days at a specific location  along with daily time series data for a user-defined base temperature and date range.  The location is represented by a latitude/longitude pair.
The default response contains results for up to the next 6 days,  on a Celsius temperature scale, for a base temperature of 10 degrees with a daily time series.

parameters.name: base
parameters.description: Base temperature

parameters.name: unit
parameters.description: Temperature unit

parameters.name: start
parameters.description:
Start date.
Start of 2015 to 7 days in the future.
(YYYY-MM-DD)

parameters.name: end
parameters.description:
End date (inclusive).
Start of 2015 to 7 days in the future.
(YYYY-MM-DD)

get.description:
Provides the growing degree days and daily time series data for a  user-defined base temperature and date range at the centroid of an asset,  along with the area-weighted arithmetic mean and range of growing degree days  over that asset. Time series values are for the centroid of the asset.
The default response contains results for up to the next 6 days,  on a Celsius temperature scale, for a base temperature of 10 degrees with a daily time series.

parameters.name: asset-uuid
parameters.description: Unique asset id.

parameters.name: base
parameters.description: Base temperature

parameters.name: unit
parameters.description: Temperature unit

parameters.name: start
parameters.description:
Start date.
Start of 2015 to 7 days in the future.
(YYYY-MM-DD)

parameters.name: end
parameters.description:
End date (inclusive).
Start of 2015 to 7 days in the future.
(YYYY-MM-DD)

get.summary: Growing degree days contours by asset
get.description:
Provides a contoured representation (GeoJSON) of growing degree days for a user-defined base temperature and date range, clipped to a asset boundary.
The default response contains results for up to the next 6 days,  on a Celsius temperature scale, for a base temperature of 10 degrees with a daily time series.

parameters.name: asset-uuid
parameters.description: Unique asset id.

Start of 2015 to 7 days in the future.
(YYYY-MM-DD)

get.description:
Provides the total amount of daily precipitation along with a  daily time series within a user-defined timespan.  The location is represented by a latitude/longitude pair.
The default response contains results in millimeters for up to the next 6 days.

Start date.

get.description:
Provides the total amount of daily precipitation within a user-defined  timespan at the centroid of an asset, along with the area-weighted  arithmetic mean and range of precipitation over that asset.  Includes a daily time series. Time series values are for the centroid of the asset.
The default response contains results in millimeters for up to the next 6 days.

parameters.description: Unique asset id.

get.description:
Provides the total amount of precipitation within a user-defined  timespan at a specific location. The location is represented by a  latitude/longitude pair. Includes an hourly time series.  The valid time of each element in the series defines the end of its hourly accumulation period.
The default response contains results in millimeters for the next 24 hours.

parameters.name: start
parameters.description:
Start time.
Start of 2015 to 7 days in the future.
(YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ)

parameters.name: end
parameters.description:
End time.
Start of 2015 to 7 days in the future.
(YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ)

parameters.name: unit
parameters.description: Unit of measure

get.description:
Provides the total amount of precipitation within a user-defined timespan  at the centroid of an asset, along with the area-weighted arithmetic mean  and range of precipitation over that asset. Includes an hourly time series.  Time series values are for the centroid of the asset.
The default response contains results for up to the next 24 hours.

Start time.
June 01, 2016 to 7 days in the future.
(YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ)

parameters.name: end

(YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ)

get.description:
Provides the total amount of solar radiation along with a daily  time series within a user-defined timespan at a specific location.  The location is represented by a latitude/longitude pair.
The default response contains results in Megajoules per square meter  for up to the next 4 days.

parameters.name: start
parameters.description:
Start date.
Start of 2015 to 5 days in the future.
(YYYY-MM-DD)

parameters.name: end
parameters.description:
End date.
Start of 2015 to 5 days in the future.
(YYYY-MM-DD)

get.description:

The default response contains results in Megajoules per square meter for up to the next 4 days.

parameters.name: start

get.summary: Daily Evapotranspiration Short Crop by asset
get.description:
Provides a daily time series for evapotranspiration-short-crop within a  user-defined timespan at the centroid of an asset, along with the area-weighted  arithmetic mean and range of temperature over that asset.  Time series values are for the centroid of the asset.
The default response contains results in millimeters per day for up to the next 4 days.

parameters.name: asset-uuid
parameters.description: Unique asset id.

parameters.name: start
parameters.description:
Start date.
June 1, 2016 to 5 days in the future
(YYYY-MM-DD)

parameters.name: end
parameters.description:
End date (inclusive).
June 1, 2016 to 5 days in the future
(YYYY-MM-DD)

parameters.name: unit
parameters.description: et unit

get.summary: Daily Evapotranspiration Short Crop contours by asset
get.description:
Provides a contoured representation (GeoJSON) of evapotranspiration-short-crop  over a date range, clipped to an asset boundary.
The default response contains results in millimeters per day for up to the next 4 days.

parameters.name: asset-uuid
parameters.description: Unique asset id.

parameters.name: validDate
parameters.description:
valid date.
June 1, 2016 to 5 days in the future. (YYYY-MM-DD)

parameters.name: unit
parameters.description: et unit

get.summary: Daily Evapotranspiration Tall Crop by location
get.description:
Provides a daily time series of evapotranspiration-tall-crop within a user-defined  timespan at a specific location. The location is represented by a latitude/longitude pair.
The default response contains results in millimeters per day for up to the next 4 days.

parameters.name: start
parameters.description:
Start date.
June 1, 2016 to 5 days in the future
(YYYY-MM-DD)

parameters.name: end
parameters.description:
End date (inclusive).
June 1, 2016 to 5 days in the future
(YYYY-MM-DD)

parameters.name: unit
parameters.description: et unit

get.summary: Hourly Evapotranspiration Short Crop by location
get.description:
Provides a hourly time series of evapotranspiration-short-crop within a user-defined  timespan at a specific location. The location is represented by a latitude/longitude pair.
The default response contains results in millimeters per hour up to the next 24 hours.

parameters.name: start
parameters.description:
Start time.
June 1, 2016 to 5 days in the future
(YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ)

parameters.name: end
parameters.description:
End time (inclusive).
June 1, 2016 to 5 days in the future
(YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ)

parameters.name: unit
parameters.description: et unit

get.summary: Climatology Daily High Temperature by location
get.description:
Provides a daily climatological high temperature time series within a user-defined timespan at a specific location. The location is represented by a latitude/longitude pair.
The default response contains results on a Celsius temperature scale for 30 year climatological results based on the current day.

parameters.name: start
parameters.description:
Start date.
a valid ISO 8601 month and day
(MM-DD)

parameters.name: end
parameters.description:
End date (inclusive).
a valid ISO 8601 month and day
(MM-DD)

parameters.name: years
parameters.description: number of years for aggregation

parameters.name: unit
parameters.description: temperature unit

get.summary: Climatology Daily High Temperature by asset
get.description:
Provides a daily climatological time series for high temperature within a user-defined timespan at the centroid of an asset, along with the area-weighted arithmetic mean and range of temperature over that asset. Time series values are for the centroid of the asset.
The default response contains results on a Celsius temperature scale for 30 year climatological results based on the current day.

parameters.name: asset-uuid
parameters.description: Unique asset id.

parameters.name: start
parameters.description:
Start date.
A valid ISO 8601 month and day
(MM-DD)

parameters.name: end
parameters.description:
End date (inclusive).
A valid ISO 8601 month and day
(MM-DD)

parameters.name: years
parameters.description: number of years for aggregation

parameters.name: unit
parameters.description: temperature unit
